title: Unwrapped
description: This season I've found a whole new level of bad. The kind who whispers naughty things while looking like a cross between a billionaire businessman and a bad boy biker. He will pay.I will make his Christmas hell and be the one waving him goodbye with my middle finger as he packs his bags and rolls out.This roof isn't big enough for the two of us.Heck, neither is this town.Or this country. Maybe the entire world.Â He packs an ego to match his size. His swagger is sexy as all hell. He smells like pine soap and new money.I won't do it. Be his Mrs. Kringle or his HO HO HO. He isn't gonna jingle my bell or put that sexy mouth of his on mine.I won't let it happen. If only I could find a way to get the man out of my damn head. If I don't I'm totally scrooged.Note:This is a full length holiday romance with plenty of spice!
author: Jax Hart
